articles.title: T20 World Cup brings cricket ‘home’ for New York’s South Asian community
articles.description: New York’s semi-professional cricketers hope the T20 World Cup will inspire the next generation to play the game.
articles.content: Long Island, New York  On a cool Sunday afternoon in May, Anjum Sabar captain of PakAmerica Cricket Club watched on as his team batted against Hawks Cricket Club on a grassy field at Eisenhower Park … [+6775 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
